description: A thin and lithe book that has been wore down by the passage of time. The ink may have faded, but the letters are as clear as the morning dew. The text outlines a method on the mapping of the mentality. One may choose to follow the orthodox path and train their talents to push through to new mental frontiers, or one could decide to fall into the temptation of an easier shortcut, one that'll grant talents immediately but would have dire consequences later on.

The culmination of extreme dedication, this treatise details the eventual acclimation of the Natalist Sequence. When first learning the spell, the game will say it'll lock you out of a bunch of other classes. Click YES to proceed. It won't actually lock you out of anything.
<color_light_red>Be warned, one should not reach the desired level for a spell solely by relying on reading. The game will not recognize it as a legitimate method and will lock out further progress. Leave some final EXP needed for spell level advancement and fill up the quota by casting the spell instead of reading the book.</color>
